section.title: Managing and Monitoring Diameter Local Peer
View Diameter Local Peer Summary
section.para: In the top, at the summary section the Type, Version and State of the &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Local Peer is shown. Also, recent measurements, Out of Bound metrics and Alerts can be seen in a summary view.

section.title: Monitor Diameter Local Peer Measurements and Availability over time
section.para: By accessing the MONITOR tab it's possible to see a set of graphs showing measurements regarding Local Peer as well as a graph showing the availability of the Diameter Local Peer over time.

listitem.para: Amount of memory from the Heap being used by the Local Peer.
Amount of memory excluding the Heap being used by the Local Peer.

section.para: It is also possible to see the data in a table, by accessing the TABLES option under MONITOR tab.
Configuration of the interval between data collection, and disable/enable certain metrics is possible, in the SCHEDULES option under MONITOR tab.

section.title: Configuration of &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Local Peer
section.para: Under the CONFIGURATION tab, it's possible to change several parameters of &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Local Peer. To start making changes, click the EDIT button:

figure.title: Configuring &THIS.PLATFORM; Diameter Local Peer with &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; Diameter Plugin.

Defines the IP Address(es) to be used by the Local Peer.
Defines the realm the Local Peer will belong to.
Defines the Vendor ID of this Diameter Peer.
Defines the internal product name of the Local Peer.
Defines the Firmware revision number for the Local Peer.
Defines the default supported Application Ids for the Local Peer. They should be defined with Vendor-Id plus Authorization and/or Accounting Application-Id.

note.para: Not all values are changeable and those are read-only.

section.para: When done editing the values, click on SAVE. In order to revert to the last saved values, click the RESET button.
